message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the gas evolution reaction that occurs when calcium carbonate (CaCO3) reacts with hydrochloric acid (HCl)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the gas evolution reaction that occurs when calcium carbonate (CaCO3) reacts with hydrochloric acid (HCl) is:

CaCO3 (s) + 2 HCl (aq) â†’ CaCl2 (aq) + H2O (l) + CO2 (g)
